messages.subject: Single Mom Homeschoolers?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I was wondering if anyone could help me with an article I am doing on single homeschoolers/unschoolers? I think this is an important topic that needs
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

I was wondering if anyone could help me with an article I am doing on single
homeschoolers/unschoolers? I think this is an important topic that needs to
be addressed. Please contact me offlist if you're interested in helping:)
thanks
Teri


Co-author of <A HREF="http://www.championpress.com/unschoolingmain.html">
Christian Unschooling: growing your child in the freedom of Christ</A>
Pre-order's available now!
Assistant Editor of <A HREF="http://www.egroups.com/group/Seedling">eGroups :
Seedling</A>
For more information see:
<A HREF="http://www.inspirit.com.au/unschooling/default.htm">Homeschooling -
Christian Unschooling - Natural Learning</A>
